text: 12:19 Godɨn Araziba 32:35; Aghuzir Akaba 24:29; Matyu 5:39; Rom 12:17; 13:4; Hibru 10:30Nan namakar aghuiba, me arazir kuram ia damightɨ, ia men arazir kuram ikarvaghan markɨ. Ia teghtɨ, God uabɨ uan anɨngagharimɨn tuavimɨn me ikarvagham. Ia fo, Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn aven en Ekiam kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Arazir kuraba ikarvaghamin ingangarim, kar nan bizim. Kɨ uabɨ men arazir kuraba ikarvagh egh ivezir kuraba me danɨngam.”
